data.message: Can you all please stop changing my timeline to "top stories" from "most recent"?  i set it to most recent because that is how i want it and "you" keep changing it.

replies.message: Hi Paula. We've found that many people have a better experience when they can tell us what they'd like to see. If there is something we can do to improve your News Feed experience, please let us know at: http://bit.ly/2efaUOL. -Hannah
It would be better if you all would stop switching my preference that i have set to see most recent to top stories.  thanks

Hi Paula. We've invested a lot to understand how News Feed can show the most engaging content to the majority of people. Top Stories is the result of our findings, which is why it is the default. We know that some people prefer the Most Recent view, so we've kept this option available. If you have specific thoughts you want to share, please let us know here: http://bit.ly/2e2b1Sx. -Jessica
My thought is, and I repeat, that if I make a setting choice, please leave it that way

Facebook will never respond to the request to leave our settings as most recent.  Why can you not understand that, Facebook?  The majority of people here want MOST RECENT.  We don't care what the top stories are since we all have different top stories.  Put whatever you want on top stories, but if we choose most recent,  just LEAVE OUR SETTING ON MOST RECENT!  PLEASE!  The option is there, but you won't let us keep that option!!
Facebook No, you did not find that, that's a lie.  The majority likes most recent.
